pr_title: Import details about scaling participation for energy consumer in CGMES (conform or not conform loads)

timeline.message:
Import details about scaling participation for energy consumer (conform or not conform loads)

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

Small improvement in CIM14 file test

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

timeline.bodyText: Indeed, what is important is that this kind of loads have a daily profile. Maybe you change comment ConformLoad represent loads that follow a daily load change pattern where the pattern can be used to scale the load with a system load.
timeline.author: annetill

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/cgmes/cgmes-conversion/src/main/java/com/powsybl/cgmes/conversion/elements/EnergyConsumerConversion.java b/cgmes/cgmes-conversion/src/main/java/com/powsybl/cgmes/conversion/elements/EnergyConsumerConversion.java
index 44adcca70..f6886486b 100644
--- a/cgmes/cgmes-conversion/src/main/java/com/powsybl/cgmes/conversion/elements/EnergyConsumerConversion.java
+++ b/cgmes/cgmes-conversion/src/main/java/com/powsybl/cgmes/conversion/elements/EnergyConsumerConversion.java

@@ -47,7 +47,7 @@ public class EnergyConsumerConversion extends AbstractConductingEquipmentConvers
     }
 
     private static void setLoadDetail(String type, Load load) {
-        if (type.endsWith("#ConformLoad")) { // can participate in scaling
+        if (type.endsWith("#ConformLoad")) { // ConformLoad represent loads that follow a daily load change pattern where the pattern can be used to scale the load with a system load
             load.newExtension(LoadDetailAdder.class)
                     .withFixedActivePower(0)
                     .withFixedReactivePower(0)
